      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_a75f2e37ea8d36be80719fa2e5fd1435b55107c2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gravitational potential energy and kinetic energy in a water dam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mögliche Gravitationsenergie und kinetische 
Energie in einer Wasserverdammung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie potentielle de la gravité et énergie 
cinétique dans un barrage de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia potencial gravitacional e energia 
cinética em uma represa da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia potenziale gravitazionale ed energia 
cinetica in una diga dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βαρύτητας πιθανή ενέργεια και κινητική ενέργεια σε 
ένα φράγμα ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía potencial gravitacional y energía 
cinética en una presa del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that the water stored in a dam has gravitational potential energy and the water flowing out from its outlet 20 m away from the water surface has kinetic energy.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">outlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß das Wasser, das in 
einer Verdammung gespeichert wird, mögliche Gravitationsenergie hat 
und das Wasser, das heraus von seinem Anschluß 20 m entfernt von der 
Wasseroberfläche fließt, kinetische Energie hat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que l'eau 
enregistrée dans un barrage a l'énergie potentielle de la gravité 
et l'eau coulant dehors de sa sortie 20 m loin de la surface de l'eau 
a l'énergie cinétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que a água 
armazenada em uma represa tem a energia potencial gravitacional e a 
água que flui para fora de sua tomada 20 m afastado da superfície da
água tem a energia cinética.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che l'acqua 
memorizzata in una diga ha energia potenziale gravitazionale e l'acqua
che fluisce fuori dalla relativa presa 20 m. via dalla superficie 
dell'acqua ha energia cinetica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι το ύδωρ που 
καταχωρείται σε ένα φράγμα έχει τη βαρύτητας πιθανή ενέργεια 
και το ύδωρ που ρέει έξω από την έξοδό του 20 μ μακρυά από την
επιφάνεια ύδατος έχει την κινητική ενέργεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que el agua salvada 
en una presa tiene energía potencial gravitacional y el agua que 
fluye hacia fuera de su enchufe 20 m lejos de la superficie del agua 
tiene energía cinética.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mögliche Gravitationsenergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anschluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie potentielle de la gravité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sortie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia potencial gravitacional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia cinética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tomada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia potenziale gravitazionale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βαρύτητας πιθανή ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κινητική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έξοδος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
